for upower 0.99.11. The latest version of this documentation can be found on-line at http://[SERVER]/upower/.

[Insert title here]
UpClient — Main client object for accessing the UPower daemon
UpDevice — Client object for accessing information about UPower devices
UpHistoryItem — Helper object representing one item of historical data.
UpStatsItem — Helper object representing one item of statistics data.
up-types — Types used by UPower and libupower-glib
up-version — Obtains the version for the installed UPower
UpWakeupItem — Helper object representing one item of wakeup data.
